PageInfo.Message:
A new species of the corrupted,<COL ffdc78>
'Severely Infected'</COL>, which becomes an
advanced type of the Corruption Demon, has
appeared.
These "Severely Infected" not only intensify the
threat of the aggressive Corruption Core, but also
has vine-like <COL ffdc78>"Sprouts"</COL> erupting
from its body.
When the Severely Infected attacks, the Sprouts
also simultaneously launch their own attacks, so
caution is necessary.

<COL ffdc78>"Sprouts" can temporarily be halted
by using skills that have healing effects on the
job class of healers or by using Element Archer's
True Aid.</COL>
During the time when the Sprouts' activity is
halted, it becomes easier to inflict damage on the
Severely Infected, so attackers should not miss
this opportunity to attack.
Also, <COL ffdc78>the more Sprouts that are
temporarily halted, the greater the amount of
damage inflicted</COL>.

Healer jobs will help efficiently defeat the
Severely Infected, in the same way as when
exposing the secret core,
Actively stop the movement of the tentacle buds!

TutorialTitleName: Tentacled buds of mad invasive demons
